text.section:
If, after investigation, the Department determines that any water supply system, sewerage system, or refuse disposal system is a menace to health or comfort or is causing a nuisance, and that conditions cannot be improved sufficiently only by changing the method of operation, the Department may order the owner:
To alter or extend the water supply system, sewerage system, or refuse disposal system; or
To install a new water supply system, sewerage system, or refuse disposal system.
An order under subsection (a) of this section shall state a reasonable date for completion of the work.

The Secretary may authorize a health officer:
To investigate refuse disposal systems; and
To enforce any regulation of the Department concerning refuse disposal systems.
